column2: How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.) Marijuana (pot, weed)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.) LSD
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.) PCP (angel dust)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.) MDMA (ecstasy)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.) Amphetamines (uppers, pep pills, bennies, speed)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Tranquilizers (Librium, Valium, Xanax, etc.)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.) “Crack” cocaine
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Cocaine in powder form
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Heroin

How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Some other narcotic (codeine, Vicodin, OxyContin, Percocet, etc.)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Crystal meth (“ice”)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Steroids (anabolic steroids)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Cigarettes
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get each of the following types of drugs, if you wanted some? (Mark one circle for each line.)Alcohol
